title: Ep. #44 | Eric's Playlist // Theme of the Week
description:
Eric gives us a live update while on the U.S. leg of the Before We Begin tour! Learn about how he felt performing at one of his dream venues and his current on-the-road playlist: Red Moon by KARD, Mirage by MRSHLL, and Teddy Bear by DAVII (feat. Kwon Jin Ah).

Make sure to subscribe to @daebakshow (IT’S FREE) and leave a comment, rating and/or review on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, Soundcloud, and YouTube.

Episodes are presented by @thedivestudios

Connect with us on all social media platforms @daebakshow and at http://www.divestudios.io/daebakshow !

SUPPORT & JOIN DIVE Studios' Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/divestudios

#EricNam #DaebakShow #BeforeWeBegin #RedMoon #KARD #Mirage #MRSHLL #TeddyBear #DAVII #KwonJinAh #Kpop #DIVEStudios
